entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm] Runtime test `simpleprovidervalidation.sh` failing on CI #81859
  • [6.0] HostActivation Tests windows x86 build failure #81851
  • [release/6.0] The target framework 'net5.0' is out of support and will not receive security updates in the future #81850
  • Optimize `lsraRegOrder` and `buildPhysRegRecords` to skip non-AVX512 registers if AVX512 not available #81847
    8.0.0
  • Update Linux/Mac Context State for AVX512 #81846
    8.0.0
  • RawData setter not accounted for in some X.509 / Pkcs extensions' memoization #81844
  • Question: Named pipes: await JsonSerializer.DeserializeAsync<T> blocks, when reading from Named pipe #81840
  • Allow for "archiving" of SPMI-generated diffs #81838
    Future
  • Code coverage failing for corelib #81835
  • [API Proposal]: Initialization constructor for collections #81834
  • STJ source generator does not correctly wrap custom converters on nullable properties #81833
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: MemoryExtensions.Replace with separate source/destination buffers #81829
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add span based apis for Array.CreateInstance/GetValue/SetValue #81826
  • JsonConverter<decimal> rounds number, even after overriding Write(...) method in custom converter #81825
  • Optimize integer arithmetic and logical operations on the values stored in vector registers, like internal representation of a floating-point number #81823
  • There're two 'EnumCalendarInfoCallback' in System.Private.CoreLib that mono-llvm-PInvoke dont support .. #81813
  • PublishAot affects non-AOT behavior #81803
  • Quic should support OpenSSL 3.x #81801
    8.0.0

Closed

  • NativeAot publish fail #81584
  • NumberFormatInfo still differs between operating systems, even in .NET 5+ - different number of decimal places #81853
  • Test failure GC/API/GC/GetAllocatedBytesForCurrentThread/GetAllocatedBytesForCurrentThread.sh #77240
  • [linux-arm64] Test failure GC/Scenarios/ServerModel/servermodel/servermodel.sh on #78168
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failure `GC/Regressions/Github/Runtime_76219/Runtime_76219/Runtime_76219.sh` #80213
  • GC crash in background_mark_simple1() #81154
  • Inconsistent behavior in `SslStream.AuthenticateAsClient` across win/linux #81590
    8.0.0
  • Wire the bootstrap build for illink #79054
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json fast path serialization not working with combined contexts #71933
    8.0.0
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Quaternion and Plane with LLVM as backend #81483
    Future
  • .NET 7, Linux, SSL connection is being reused between independent HttpClients? #79869
    7.0.x
  • .Net 7 Distributed Transaction - scope.Dispose() block process #81469
  • Assertion in libraries-jitstress System.Numerics.Tests.PlaneTests:PlaneToStringTest #81739
  • Blazor wasm DateOnly.DayOfWeek not localized #81820
  • [TestFailures] EventSource_ExistsWithCorrectId fails on NativeAoT #81824
  • Test failure System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.Tests.ReferenceHandlerTests_Default_String.ArrayPreserveDuplicateObjects #81670
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json issue with interface inheritance #81815
  • SPMI: Warn when comparing throughput of JITs compiled with PGO data #81690
    8.0.0
  • Change the default package for the "Used By" section on GitHub #81078
  • Ensure illink packages flow to source build #80319
    8.0.0
  • Consolidate Microsoft.DotNet.Cecil* libraries into one nuget package #77692
  • Logging isnt shown and exception isnt thrown when using aspnet:6.0.13-alpine3.17-amd64 #81218
    6.0.x
  • [API Proposal]: Improvements on `Queue<T>` and `Stack<T>` #80327
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow root path for Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.SpecialDirectories #81861
    area-Microsoft.VisualBasic
  • Skip `tracing/eventpipe/simpleprovidervalidation/` on wasm #81860
    test-failure, arch-wasm
  • [release/6.0] Update arm queues #81858
  • Fix AllocateRegularStaticBox for FOH #81857
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Skip TestNativeLibraryProbingOnPathEnv on macOS #81856
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Fix rva[cns] folding #81854
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reset errno before the fallback in getexepath #81852
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE][wasm] wasi: add workload packs, templates, and Wasi.Build.Tests #81849
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, wasi
  • [release/6.0] Supress Check EOL Target Framework #81848
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix vector's Narrow intrinsics #81843
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix a couple of JsonConstructor bugs & clean up JsonParameterInfo implementation. #81842
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • update alpine test images #81841
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [release/7.0] [NativeAOT] correctly initalize CONTEXT before failing fast #81837
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix src/tests/build.sh argument processing #81836
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Replace some single-char strings with chars #81831
    area-Meta
  • Validate the Kept attribute against the presence of EEType in NativeAOT #81830
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] handle PDB files as asset type #81828
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • XmlWriter respects NewLineOnAttributes when writing xmlns #81822
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • evaluate-default-paths.yml: Add paths for wasi #81817
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Update message #81816
    area-Microsoft.VisualBasic
  • [wasm] Optimize out redundant null checks in the jiterpreter #81811
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/6.0] Prevent unwinding through stack bottom #81805
    Servicing-consider, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Prevent unwinding through stack bottom #81804
    Servicing-consider, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 7.0.x

Merged

  • [release/7.0] Set AssemblyName.ProcessorArchitecture for compatibility. #81101
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection.Metadata, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 7.0.4
  • [release/7.0] Fix TarWriter.TarEntry exception when adding file whose Unix group owner does not exist in the system #81139
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Formats.Tar, 7.0.4
  • [Release/7.0] CoreCLR initialization failures logging #81134
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.4
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] Fix analyzer support in templates #81077
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.4
  • [release/7.0] [mono][aot] Disable dedup for wrapper with a return type which has a … #81003
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 7.0.4
  • Enable AVX512 Additional 16 SIMD Registers #79544
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [mono][loader] Set status on success #80951
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.4
  • [release/7.0] [Mono] Fix function pointer check #80927
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.4
  • [release/7.0] Correctly handle HFA structs when crossgen'd on Arm64 #80881
    Servicing-approved, area-crossgen2-coreclr, 7.0.4
  • [release/7.0] Update arm queues #81712
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Ensure CNS_VEC and BLK are handled for setLclRelatedToSIMDIntrinsic #81760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Minimally light up Quaternion and Plane for Mono SIMD #81541
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [release/7.0] Fix nested non-byref like VC with no pointer fields #80873
    Servicing-approved, area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.4
  • [release/7.0][browser] improve default initial memory size #80849
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.4
  • [release/7.0] [Android] Add error code to the assert error message #80701
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 7.0.4
  • [release/6.0] Use BOOL (vs. bool) in event pipe qcall signatures #81238
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 6.0.15
  • Refine corerun instructions. Improve argument parsing in src/tests/build. #81733
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Allow source-build to set UsingToolMicrosoftNetCompilers property #81180
  • [Mono] Fix typo in arm64-codegen.h #81845
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT: Handle promoted struct liveness updates properly in forward sub #81789
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • don't send server_name when literal IP #81631
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • Support use of fast-path serialization in combined JsonSerializerContexts. #80741
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Initial work to port EventPipe library to NativeAOT #80382
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [json] Use S.R.I vectors in JsonReaderHelper #81758
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [release/7.0] fix TLS resume with client certificates on Linux #81795
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.4
  • [release/6.0] Correctly handle HFA structs when crossgen'd on Arm64 #80872
    Servicing-approved, area-crossgen2-coreclr, 6.0.15
  • [release/7.0] Target lower glibc for Linux arm64 #80866
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 7.0.4
  • [release/6.0] Improve servicing docs for Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility #81800
    documentation, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.x
  • Handle crash when [out] parameter of type int is passed to delegate #81276
    area-Interop-mono, community-contribution
  • JIT: Avoid omitting copies for struct fields passed implicitly by reference #81787
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix race condition when accessing nested JsonTypeInfo metadata #81821
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Prevent unwinding through stack bottom #81770
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Update version of Microsoft.DotNet.ApiCompat.Task #81772
  • SPMI: Warn when comparing throughput of JITs compiled with native PGO #81716
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Close MsQuic after checking for QUIC support to free resources #80785
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Quic, 6.0.15
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2107735 #81700
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix handling of the generic byreflike constraint #81684
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Pin the version of chrome used for tests - `109.0.5414.119` #81814
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0] More Windows Arm64 helix queues 10->11 #81807
    area-Infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] More Windows Arm64 helix queues 10->11 #81808
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [mono][aot] Optimize constrained calls made from gsharedvt methods. #79339
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/6.0] Bump non-existent Win10 ARM64 helix queue to Win11 #81802
    area-Infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [wasm] [jiterp] Add optimized C version of STFLD_O that uses correct write barrier #81806
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/6.0][Android] Disable 32-bit nfloat tests #81735
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [release/6.0] [Android] Add NetworkChange implementation using PeriodicTimer (#80548) #81349
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 6.0.15
  • [release/6.0] Don't pass --minimize to Xcode 13.3 dsymutil #81042
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 6.0.15
  • [release/6.0] Allow retaining the original casing for known header values #80754
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.15
  • [release/6.0] [Android] Add error code to the assert error message #80702
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 6.0.15
  • Bump non-existent Win10 ARM64 helix queue to Win11 #81545
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.4
  • Update branding to 6.0.15 #81776
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 7.0.4 #81777
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Fix filtered exceptions when checking for ip forwarding #81157
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 7.0.4
  • Add basic support for folding SIMD intrinsics #81547
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0][browser][http] Fix blocking of streaming response and abort #81092
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.x
  • JIT: Relax reg-optionality validity checks #81614
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Support containing compares in GT_SELECT for xarch (i.e. start emitting cmov instructions) #81267
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add star into link attributes #81407
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Improve ConcurrentDictionary performance, in particular for strings #81557
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Unify type instantiations in reflection emit #81518
    area-System.Reflection
  • [release/6.0] Starting metrics before runtime start leads to a crash #81307

entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • tmp file copy failed the Aot Test #30456
  • dotnet tools occasionally hang #30455
  • SDK 6.0.113 build freezes under source build #30449
  • I have c# please send me solution #30445
  • Workload MSI Tests Are Hard to Write #30419

Closed

  • [NETSDKE2E] With NET8 preview 1 SDK installed, component names display incorrectly when installing workload. #30395

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30457
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #30454
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #30434
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • READ.ME Includes PR Timeline Guide + Explain Nightly Builds in Documentation #30263
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30353
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Introduce `exp` prefix in PR to allow better PR review process #30363
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #30416
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Log MSI package ID instead of MSI filename #30420
    Area-Workloads
  • fix repo build on non-ubuntu linux #30379
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix SupportsTargetFramework for tests - 7.0.2xx #30234
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #30414
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #30413
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #30410
    Area-Infrastructure
  • fixed bug in `CreateTemporaryFolder` counter logic #30359
  • Fix up 'CurrentTargetFramework' usage error #30212
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch to OSX 12 for 7.0.1xx #30081
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2108647 #30412
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Introduce `Workload Clean`: Garbage Collection Component #30266
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Adding the linux feed removal to 6.0.1xx as I figured out the issue #30037
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.8.0 to 19.9.0 in /eng/dependabot #30355
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies
  • GenAPI: synthesize private fields for value types #30362
    Area-GenAPI
  • Filter out default member attribute for types with indexer. Implement filtering out base type and interfaces. #30394
    Area-GenAPI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #30417
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Proposal]: [我遇到一个关于泛型的问题，我调试了数小时，最后难以找到是何原因。最后怀疑内部逻辑] #6955

PullRequests

Merged

  • Create proposals/collection-literals.md from proposal in #5354 #6949
  • Clarify restrictions for accessing captured primary constructor parameters in a readonly context. #6938

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • LSP pull diagnostics should return nothing (except syntax error) prior to the workspace being fully loaded. #66761
  • Move `UseValueTuple` from `SymbolDisplayCompilerInternalOptions` to `SymbolDisplayMiscellaneousOptions` #66757
  • GetProjectDependencyGraph doesn't return dependencies #66754
  • Adjust SymbolDisplay member options behavior for interface members #66753

Closed

  • 'use auto property' codefix somethimes creates private setter for readonly fields #25408
    Backlog
  • Find All References should give a better message when not invoked on a symbol #24886
    Backlog
  • Rename dashboard counts references in shared files multiple times #12300
    Backlog
  • Improvements for Invert If refactoring #25241
    Backlog
  • Comment nodes not being renamed #25100
    Backlog
  • Verify unused strings are eventually removed from the SQLite string table #24645
    Backlog
  • Out declaration missing type in autocompletion list #21055
    Backlog
  • Formatter should remove spaces inside interpolated string braces #24498
    Backlog
  • Code formatting not working using open directory #24365
    Backlog
  • Pattern Matching: Consider using VS's algorithm for merging two or more matches #24294
    Backlog
  • Lost color on type names during copy & paste in wordprocessor #24073
    Backlog
  • VB: Structure guidelines do not show tooltips any more #24067
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.CodeGeneration.AttributeGenerator is useful but internal #23838
    Backlog
  • 'CSharpAddImportCodeFixProvider' crash #23658
    Backlog
  • ExtractMethod: Weird VS 2017 15.4.4 behaviour #23401
    Backlog
  • Structure guide lines not working #23234
    Backlog
  • UseNullPropagation should handle boolean scenarios #23075
    Backlog
  • Snippets not offered in completion above usings in C# #22810
    Backlog
  • NavigateTo on resource string should also find the RESX entry #22801
    Backlog
  • [Flaky] SuppressSyntaxDiagnosticsOnTypesCSharp is flaky #22676
    Backlog
  • StateSet.ContainsAnyDocumentOrProjectDiagnostics heavy allocator #22609
    Backlog
  • UnboundIdentifiers: Bad overload resolution error for constructor call in lambda with #warning #22615
    Backlog
  • Roslyn.VisualStudio.IntegrationTests.CSharp.CSharpGoToDefinition.GoToDefinitionWithMultipleResults Failure #22577
    Backlog
  • Spurious squiggle sometimes stays in the editor after error is fixed #22566
    Backlog
  • Suppressing IDE0034 does not work correctly #22506
    Backlog
  •  Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.UnitTests.WorkspaceServices.SQLitePersistentStorageTests.PersistentService_Document_WriteReadSameInstance is flakey #22437
    Backlog
  • Incorrect completion when adding an argument to an async lambda #22343
    Backlog
  • dotnet_style_qualification_for_property has faulty heuristic #22212
    Backlog
  • Intermittent test failure: VerifyReorderAndRemoveParametersAcrossLanguages #21955
    Backlog
  • NullReferenceException in ReplaceMethodWithPropertyCodeRefactoringProvider #21934
    Backlog
  • Suggest out variable name #21837
    Backlog
  • Object initializer intellisense doesn't work if you implement IList #21802
    Backlog
  • Generate method into closed file hangs (but is cancellable) #21179
    Backlog
  • Typing 'new ' where a parameter with generic type is expected brings up a nonexistent type #21049
    Backlog
  • IDE0049 should be updated to suggest converting IntPtr to nint and UIntPtr to nuint. #63421
    Backlog
  • API/behavior changes needed to enable LSP pull diagnostics in 17.6 #63861
    17.5

PullRequests

Created

  • Support 'make method async' on an unbound 'await' identifier parsed as a variable declaration. #66764
    Area-IDE
  • Move task list initialization code to BG. #66763
    Area-IDE
  • Add a test for FAR on symbol with empty name #66762
    Area-IDE
  • Discourage non-incremental source generators #66752
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Merge pull request #1 from dotnet/master #66751
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Remove all partial analysis state tracking in CompilationWithAnalyzers #66750

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Different implementations of `GenerateRadioButton()` and `GenerateCheckBox()` in `DefaultHtmlGenerator.cs` #46535
  • Perf regression: https #46534
  • Avoid closure in IConnectionBuilder.Use #46533
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Problem with conuming blazor server custom element through another webApp! #46531
  • String array queries do not use commas to separate each element #46530
  • Set dynamically @page #46529
  • Limitation with using Multiple Cookie Authentications #46528
  • Certain HTTP/2 requests failing with a 504 when going through an F5 BIG-IP device #46527
  • Would be nice if Virtualized blazor component keeps a head and a tail of objects #46526
  • Perf regression: plainTextSansFilter #46525
  • DOTNET_ROOT while running tests #46524
  • within wasm, we need js idl binding library. #46520

Closed

  • When the 'no-cache' Response Caching Header set, 'max-age' still required. #42705
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Microsoft.Bcl.HashCode not resolved from generator #46510
    8.0-preview2

PullRequests

Created

  • [WIP] Support metadata only endpoints #46536
    area-web-frameworks
  • [blazor] startup sequence unification #46532
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 8.0
  • Add HTTP/3 test to verify platform support #46523
    area-runtime
  • No constraints #46522
    area-runtime
  • Refactor named pipes connection listener completion #46521
    area-runtime
  • Reduce allocations caused by Range operators on arrays and strings #46519
  • Remove incorrect/unnecessary trimming suppressions. #46518

Merged

  • Remove unnecessary code from F# templates #46443
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 8.0-preview2
  • Add comment to gRPC template tests SkipOnAlpine attribute #46517
    area-mvc, area-grpc, 8.0-preview2
  • Update Debian11 Arm64 queue to Debian12 #46419
    8.0-preview2
  • Update milestone for servicing PRs #46514
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview2
  • Remove 'max-age' in 'Cache-Control' Response Header when Location is None ('no-cache'). #42706
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-preview2
  • Use HashCode helper class instead of package #46513
    8.0-preview2

Updated

  • Changing reflection-based json configuration #46303
    area-web-frameworks
  • Added operation cancel operation #46330
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • ServerComparison.FunctionalTests: extend nginx configuration so nginx starts on RHEL and Fedora. #46507
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix the IsKnownImmutableType method to return true for enum types #42901
    blocked, area-blazor, stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun
  • Allow injection of Gson or JsonParser (or both) when constructing JsonHubProtocol #45555
    area-signalr, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add CssClass property to ValidationSummary #43928
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Continuation of PR 40097 (Input components should use SetUpdatesAttributeName) #46434
    area-blazor
  • Greater than 1 FromBody analyzer. #46494
    area-web-frameworks
  • [release/7.0] Add support for JSON output to more `user-jwts` commands #45431
    Servicing-consider, area-commandlinetools, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • SDK Bump to `8.0.100-alpha.1.23077.6` #46328
    area-infrastructure
  • Named pipe caching test #46515
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • O programa "[20588] MauiApp1.exe" foi fechado com o código 2147942405 (0x80070005). #13211
  • FilePicker: A device attached to the system is not functioning. (0x8007001F) #13207

  • Can not run the app #13203
  • [WinUI] CollectionView has default native PointerOver state which cannot be removed #13197
    Backlog
  • avoid use implicit-conversion operators for shell #13190
    Backlog
  • TapGestureRecognizer not respecting the NumberOfTapsRequired property #13189
    Backlog
  • [Regression] CarouselView with Loop="False" containing ScrollView does not resize to reveal newly visible items #13188
    Backlog
  • [Android][Mac Catalyst] ScrollView with Orientation Both cannot scroll both directions (missing scrollbar) #13187
    Backlog
  • [Maps] [Android] Registering for CameraMove events in a custom MapHandler disables Map.VisibleRegion.Center #13186
    Backlog
  • [Android] [Regression] NavigationPage.TitleView with ScrollView causes: (1) crashes, and (2) blank pages with stuck ToolbarItems #13185

Closed

  • On Windows (WinUI) Minimize, Normal, Maximize buttons behave strangely #7751

  • Set underlying sdk version to a lower version #13183
  • Opened in error #13212
  • [Android] [Regression] CarouselView throws unhandled java.lang.RuntimeException paging through images - Canvas: trying to use a recycled bitmap #13182

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Auto insert for a related entity may insert duplicated rows with a `one-to-one` relationship #30236
  • The path params of EF.Functions.JsonExtract cannot use variable. #30235
  • Sum throwing exception when property has a ValueConverter with ConvertsNulls set to true #30233
  • Add expression support for abstract properties #30232
  • Unexpected `RenameIndex` added to EF Core migration after upgrading from EF Core 3.1 to EF Core 6 #30231
  • EF Core Throwing Exception with Successfully Inserting Record #30230
  • Unable to Add code first migration #30229
  • IComparable/IEquatable could not be translated #30228
  • EF incorrectly generates INNER JOIN (instead of LEFT JOIN) on optional FK with explicit fluent configuration #30227

Closed

  • Value comparer out of memory #30194
  • ExecuteSqlRaw(string) fails with FormatException 'Input string was not in a correct format.' #30188
  • RelationalConnectionDependencies depending on IRelationalCommandBuilderFactory #30187
  • Support some form of dependency injection to parameterize a `Migration` #30141
  • Include() ignored when using GroupBy entity type #30138
  • ExecuteUpdateAsync in EF Core: set property based on Logic throws InvalidOperation Exception #30119
  • IndexOutOfRangeException in CreateNavigationExpansionExpression(Expression sourceExpression, IEntityType entityType) / get_Chars(Int32 index) when EF class named "<>f__AnonymousType01Child" in 7.0.2 version #30115
  • context.Update causes DELETE instead of UPDATE #30102
  • Wrong SQL translating from LINQ to SQL looking for all users that have all the specified claims. #30005
  • Migration bundle only executes code in `Development` mode #29951

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't set table names from DbSet properties when Discriminator property is conflicted with the default but is then configured explicitly #30234

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #30226
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Updated

  • Mark bundle Program.cs as auto-generated #30210
